data.description: Normalize and parse inflected Russian names
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Russian is an inflected language, so proper names can appear in any
    of seven cases. There are also common contractions and elisions
    (Ivanovich => Ivanich) that can make the same name appear in
    multiple variants. This module will serve to normalize names to
    their full form in the nominative case.
